<<<<<<< HEAD My Blogofile Example Just a simple HTML5 blog 2014-03-02T03:58:23Z Blogofile http://www.example.com/blog/feed/atom/ http://www.example.com/blog Some tips on Cachelab http://www.example.com/blog/2014/03/01/some-tips-on-cachelab 2014-03-01T05:01:18Z 2014-03-01T05:01:18Z Some tips on Cachelab

Ok.. This lab is actually not that difficult. I just made some supid error in the c code which wasted me like 4 hours to find it out.

There are two parts in this lab. Part A asks you to finish a cache simulator, and part B requires you to write a program to transpose matrix with limited cache miss.

For part A, it should be quite easy since only hit count, miss count and eviction count are required. So just malloc some memory and then process each trace and update cache status after each trace. The results are there then.

For part B, it is a little tricky for the case 64 * 64 matrix. What I did is that use a 4 * 8 subset in matrix B as a buffer so it could always be hit when reading or writing these memories.

Assume blow is a submatrix S with size of 8 * 8. And we also vertically seperate the 4 * 8 buffer into to parts, B1 and B2. |---+---| | 1 | 2 | |---+---| | 3 | 4 | |---+---|

So if we want to transpose SAn into SBm, the SBm would be like:

|----+----| | 1' | 2' | |----|----| | 3' | 4' | |----|----|

Then the buffer would be of great help for us.

Opperations are like: + 1T -> T1 + 2T -> T2 + 4T -> 4' + T2 -> 3' + 3T -> T2 + T1 -> 1' + T2 -> 2'

These operations designed in 4 * 4 should only causes 16 misses for the transpose of a 8 * 8 submatrix.

Anglo-Saxon Rune Poem:

ᚠᛇᚻ᛫ᛒᛦᚦ᛫ᚠᚱᚩᚠᚢᚱ᛫ᚠᛁᚱᚪ᛫ᚷᛖᚻᚹᛦᛚᚳᚢᛗ ᛋᚳᛖᚪᛚ᛫ᚦᛖᚪᚻ᛫ᛗᚪᚾᚾᚪ᛫ᚷᛖᚻᚹᛦᛚᚳ᛫ᛗᛁᚳᛚᚢᚾ᛫ᚻᛦᛏ᛫ᛞᚫᛚᚪᚾ ᚷᛁᚠ᛫ᚻᛖ᛫ᚹᛁᛚᛖ᛫ᚠᚩᚱ᛫ᛞᚱᛁᚻᛏᚾᛖ᛫ᛞᚩᛗᛖᛋ᛫ᚻᛚᛇᛏᚪᚾ᛬

Tamil poetry:

யாமறிந்த மொழிகளிலே தமிழ்மொழி போல் இனிதாவது எங்கும் காணோம், பாமரராய் விலங்குகளாய், உலகனைத்தும் இகழ்ச்சிசொலப் பான்மை கெட்டு, நாமமது தமிழரெனக் கொண்டு இங்கு வாழ்ந்திடுதல் நன்றோ? சொல்லீர்! தேமதுரத் தமிழோசை உலகமெலாம் பரவும்வகை செய்தல் வேண்டும்.

I can eat glass: 私はガラスを食べられます。それは私を傷つけません。 Կրնամ ապակի ուտել և ինծի անհանգիստ չըներ։ I kå Glas frässa, ond des macht mr nix! ᚛᚛ᚉᚑᚅᚔᚉᚉᚔᚋ ᚔᚈᚔ ᚍᚂᚐᚅᚑ ᚅᚔᚋᚌᚓᚅᚐ᚜ אני יכול לאכול זכוכית וזה לא מזיק לי काचं शक्नोम्यत्तुम् । नोपहिनस्ति माम् ॥

http://www.example.com/blog Post 2 http://www.example.com/blog/2010/07/24/post-2 2010-07-24T16:20:00Z 2010-07-24T16:20:00Z Post 2

This is post #2.

This post just shows off some markdown features. Markdown is a simple HTML markup language in plain text, so it's easier to read and write.

This is a heading

This is a reference1 to a footnote.

This is a sub-heading {#a_custom_id}

This section has a custom id on it's <h2> tag.

This is a table

First Header Second Header
Content Cell Content Cell
Content Cell Content Cell

Here are some definitions

Apple
Pomaceous fruit of plants of the genus Malus in the family Rosaceae.
Orange
The fruit of an evergreen tree of the genus Citrus.

Some code

This is using the Fenced Code extension to markdown, but Blogofile has it's own code filter that does syntax highlighting too.

import this
print("2 + 2 = {0}".format(2+2))
